plot: After playing a prank on the whole town, Bart is sentenced to six months of juvenile detention. There he meets Gina, who forces Bart to escape with her.

Bart plays a prank on the entire city when he invites everybody for a fake wedding and takes all the gifts so he can return them for store credit. Chief Wiggum catches him and Bart is sent to jail. In jail Bart meets Gina Vendetti who escapes with Bart. Gradually, Gina and Bart get to know and understand each other.—Marco van Hoof <k_luifje7@hotmail.com>
